titleStmt.title: The loyal subjects teares, for the sufferings and absence of their sovereign, Charles II. King of England, Scotland & Ireland. With an observation upon the expunging of exit tyrannas regum ultimus, by order of General Monk. And some advice to the Independents, Anabaptists, Phanatiques, &c.

notesStmt.note: Annotation on Thomason copy: "Marsh. 21. 1659"; also the last two numbers of the imprint date have been marked through.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
